title: The Highball Recipe
full_text:
The Highball Recipe

Cook Mode

Ingredients
2
ounces
liquor of choice:
scotch
, bourbon, rye, aged rum and brandy are all classics for a reason
2 to 6
ounces
chilled club soda or
ginger ale
, to taste
Directions
Fill a highball glass with ice. Add liquor, top with club soda or ginger ale or a combination of both. Do what comes natural.
